Package com.vaultapp.controller

Class MainGUIController

java.lang.Object
com.vaultapp.controller.MainGUIController
public class MainGUIController extends Object
The MainGUIController is a controller class for the main GUI view. It allows users to view and manage their books and films in a selected vault.
